mapper.select: SELECT ch.challenge_idx, ca.category_name, ch.member_idx, ch.challenge_name, ch.challenge_type, ch.challenge_status, ch.challenge_limit, ch.detailed_category, ch.challenge_start_date, ch.challenge_end_date FROM challenge ch JOIN category ca ON ca.category_idx = ch.category_idx WHERE ch.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND ch.is_public = 1 AND ch.is_delete = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge (member_idx, challenge_name, challenge_type, challenge_limit, category_idx, detailed_category, challenge_status, challenge_start_date, challenge_end_date, is_public) VALUES (#{memberIdx}, #{challengeName}, #{challengeType}, #{challengeLimit},#{categoryIdx}, #{detailedCategory}, #{challengeStatus}, #{challengeStartDate}, #{challengeEndDate}, #{isPublic})
mapper.select: SELECT ct.card_transaction_description FROM card_transaction ct JOIN card c ON ct.card_idx = c.card_idx WHERE c.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND ct.category_idx = #{categoryIdx} AND c.connected_status = 1

SELECT c.challenge_idx, c.challenge_limit, CASE WHEN c.challenge_type = "횟수" THEN COALESCE(COUNT(ct.card_transaction_idx), 0) WHEN c.challenge_type = "금액" THEN COALESCE(SUM(ct.amount), 0) END AS cardHistoryCount FROM challenge c LEFT JOIN card_transaction ct ON ct.card_transaction_date BETWEEN c.challenge_start_date AND c.challenge_end_date AND ct.card_transaction_description LIKE CONCAT('%', c.detailed_category, '%') AND ct.category_idx = c.category_idx WHERE c.member_idx = #{memberIdx} AND c.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY c.challenge_idx, c.challenge_limit, c.challenge_type

SELECT ch.challenge_idx, ch.challenge_name, ch.challenge_type, ch.challenge_limit, ch.category_idx, ch.detailed_category, ch.challenge_status, ca.category_name FROM challenge ch JOIN category ca ON ca.category_idx = ch.category_idx WHERE is_public = 1 AND is_delete = 0
